IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE ORGANIZATION PROVIDES SERVICES TO THE ELDERLY AND DISABLED POPULATION WITHIN THE MONTACHUSETT AREA.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE ORGANIZATION PROVIDES SERVICES TO THE ELDERLY AND DISABLED POPULATION WITHIN THE MONTACHUSETT AREA.
IRS990.Desc: THE STATE HOME CARE/ENHANCED COMMUNITY OPTIONS PROGRAMS PROVIDED HOME CARE SERVICES TO 1,006 CLIENTS IN AN AVERAGE MONTH IN FISCAL YEAR 2018.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: THE ADULT FAMILY CARE PROGRAM PROVIDED FOSTER CARE SERVICES TO 91 CLIENTS IN AN AVERAGE MONTH IN FISCAL YEAR 2018.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: THE COMMUNITY CHOICES PROGRAM PROVIDED PURCHASED SERVICES TO 93 PUBLICLY SPONSORED CLIENTS IN AN AVERAGE MONTH IN FISCAL YEAR 2018.

ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: OTHER PROGRAMS PROVIDED SERVICES SUCH AS HOME CARE MANAGEMENT, COORDINATION OF CARE, HOUSING, CRISIS INTERVENTION, GROUP ADULT FAMILY CARE, MONEY MANAGEMENT, OMBUDSMAN, PROTECTIVE SERVICES, CASE MANAGEMENT, CAREGIVING, LONG TERM CARE OPTIONS, ONE CARE AND SENIOR CARE OPTIONS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: COMMUNICATION WITH MA STATE GOVERNMENT OFFICIALS REGARDING ELDER CARE FUNDING

OTHER PROGRAMS PROVIDED SERVICES SUCH AS HOME CARE MANAGEMENT, COORDINATION OF CARE, HOUSING, CRISIS INTERVENTION, GROUP ADULT FAMILY CARE, MONEY MANAGEMENT, OMBUDSMAN, PROTECTIVE SERVICES, CASE MANAGEMENT, CAREGIVING, LONG TERM CARE OPTIONS, ONE CARE AND SENIOR CARE OPTIONS.
FINANCE COMMITTEE REVIEWS FORM 990 BEFORE FILING. IT IS ALSO PRESENTED TO THE ENTIRE BOARD AT A BOARD MEETING.
DIRECTORS OF THE ORGANIZATION DISCLOSE ANY POTENTIAL CONFLICTS OF INTEREST. ANY DIRECTOR WITH A CONFLICT OF INTEREST ABSTAINS FROM VOTING.

THE PROCESS FOR DETERMINING COMPENSATION OF THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AND CFO INCLUDES REVIEW AND APPROVAL BY THE PERSONNEL AND FINANCE COMMITTEES. COMPARATIVE DATA IS PROVIDED THROUGH MASS HOME CASE AND/OR WORCESTER COMMUNITY FOUNDATION FOR SALARY DETERMINATION.
COMPARATIVE DATA IS PROVIDED THROUGH MASS HOME CARE AND/OR WORCESTER COMMUNITY FOUNDATION FOR SALARY DETERMINATION.

SOME OF THE ORGANIZATION'S BOARD MEMBERS ALSO SERVE AS BOARD MEMBERS FOR THE NON-PROFIT ORGANIZATIONS AYER ELDERLY HOUSING PARTNERSHIP, INC.(AEHP) AND NORTHBROOK VILLAGE II, INC., WHICH PROVIDE AFFORDABLE ELDERLY HOUSING. MHCC IS THE SPONSOR FOR THE ELDERLY HOUSING PROJECTS UNDERTAKEN BY THESE ORGANIZATIONS, AND AT TIMES MHCC HAS ADVANCED FUNDS TO PAY FOR START-UP OR CONSTRUCTION COSTS. MHCC HOLDS BANK ACCOUNTS FOR BOTH OF THESE ORGANIZATIONS, THE COMBINED CASH BALANCE OF 20,912 IS INCLUDED IN BOTH CASH AND ACCOUNTS PAYABLE ON JUNE 30, 2018. DURING FY2016, NORTHBROOK VILLAGE SOLD ITS REAL PROPERTY TO NORTHBROOK SENIOR LIMITED PARTNERSHIP (NBSLP). NORTHBROOK SENIOR MANAGER, LLC (NBSM) IS 0.01% OWNER AND THE GENERAL PARTNER OF NBSLP, AND MHCC IS 79% OWNER OF NBSM. INCLUDED IN ACCOUNTS RECEIVABLE AT JUNE 30, 2018 WAS 381,965 DUE TO MHCC FROM NBSLP FOR AMOUNTS THAT MHCC ADVANCED TO PAY EXPENSES OF THE PROPERTY. AS THE SPONSOR OF NBSLP, MHCC IS ENTITLED TO A DEVELOPER'S FEE OF 470,000, OF WHICH THE BALANCE DUE AT JUNE 30, 2018 WAS 336,105. AS IT IS NOT APPARENT WHEN THIS MIGHT BE PAID, MANAGEMENT HAS ELECTED NOT TO RECORD A RECEIVABLE.
